name: Rugby League Live 2: Quick Match
description:
GET YOUR QUICK FIX OF RUGBY LEAGUE! 
The ultimate iPhone & iPad rugby league experience! 
Tru Blu Entertainment and Wicked Witch Software present Rugby League Live 2: Quick Match. Designed for quick play and on-the-go fun! 

OFFICIAL NRL and Super League licensed product!

Australia vs. England!

Experience all the emotion and adrenaline of world class Rugby League! 

QUICK MATCH 
Step into your boots and out to the arena! With advanced, life-like graphics, dominate the field with the Australian or English team of your choice. You can almost smell the sweat of being in the action. Play a Quick Match with all the passion, all the power and all the precision of great sporting heroes in the best Rugby League game!

GAME CENTRE ACHIEVEMENTS / LEADERBOARDS 
Challenge your Rugby footwork and see how your abilities rank against your friends, or for a greater challenge, other gamers from around the world. 

FULL 3D! 
Features full 3D stadium, goals, ball and player animations that create impressive and realistic visuals. Combined with stylish camera transitions and smooth effects you will be catapulted right into the action! 

FEATURES 
--Customisable options to suit your own personal preferences! 
--Develop your skills on ‘Easy’, or challenge yourself in ‘Legend’ mode 
--Featuring Australia vs. England
--Easy to learn, difficult to master, incredibly addictive! 
--Life like animation 
--Realistic ball physics 
--True to life 3D stadium 
--An incredibly realistic rugby league experience with quality graphics & sound. 
--Dynamic camera angles 
--Intuitive touch controls 
--Online leaderboard – flaunt your achievements and see how you rank against players from across the world 
--Facebook integration – compete with your friends to get the highest score and post brags to your wall
